item.title: 딕펑스,전지윤 - 소울메이트
item.description:
Are you
crazy?
Every time
I told you that yeah
You’re the only one
for me

나 혼자 딴생각

넌 허구한 날
딱 걸려
내가 매일
네 눈치 살펴야겠니

up to me oh God
I don’t know
if she is my soulmates

yeah yeah(yeah yeah)

always I’m your love

you’re so beautiful
